name: CENTAUR WARDEN

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The centaur makes two attacks, using Forest Staff or Sun Ray in any combination.

actions.name: Forest Staff
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Sun Ray
actions.text: Ranged Attack Roll: +7, range 90 ft. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) Radiant damage, and the target has the Blinded condition until the start of the centaur's next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text: The centaur casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15): At Will: Druidcraft, Speak with Animals

bonus_actions.name: Entangling Trail (Recharge 5-6)
bonus_actions.text: The centaur moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. Each creature within 5 feet of the centaur as it moves is targeted once by the following effect. Strength Saving Throw: DC 15. Failure: 11 (2d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Restrained condition until the end of its next turn.
